public class ProfileQueryHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Start time:12:49:42 2009-03-20
Project: mobicents-jainslee-server-core
This class handles queries call to certain ProfileTable impl objects. It must be called within transaction

Bartosz Baranowski , Alexandre Mendonca
